kpi.name: M1023C23

kpi_info.title: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR RT E-DCH STREAMING UL
kpi_info.use: The amount of MAC-d PDU Streaming call data for RT E-DCH UL. UPDATED: The counter is updated at 20-second intervals. If the UE is in softer handover, then the counters are updated for only one cell once per each BTS.

kpi.kpi_alias: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR RT E-DCH STREAMING UL
